title: Sold - 1908 Rube Marquard postcard - Rookie card
author: the-illini

posts.post_title: Sold - 1908 Rube Marquard postcard - Rookie card
posts.post_content:
SGC 10 due to crease and piece missing from top, but image of Marquard is undamaged and card presents very nicely despite flaws. Very tough card to come by for rookie collectors. SOLD

PM with questions or to purchase

Thanks

Chris
